name: Nib:The Forests of Geela
description: After stepping on the grass of some rich dude's lawn, our hero has been banished to the distant planet of Geela with a noodle sword as their only weapon. Navigate your way though six levels, upgrade your pitiful weapon, and mod the game if 1. You think you can make better MS Paint art than me or 2. You know Python, the coolest coding language ever. Oh yeah, and play a bunch of mingames too!
